source.sqlReaderQuery: select count (*) as RecordCount from saleslt.customer
select count (*) as RecordCount from saleslt.product
select max (ModifiedDate) as LastRecordDate from salesLT.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('ACT_LKP_Get_High_WaterMark_TimeStamp').output.firstRow.Prop_0}' and ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('ACT_LKP_Get_Last_Modified_TimeStamp').output.firstRow.LastRecordDate}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'SalesLT'
select count (*) as RecordCount from saleslt.product
